name: 9.20 "Crash of the Titans" Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 9 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did Norm help get a tab?
questions.explanation:
Paul.

	He stated that Paul had been a loyal customer for years.  Then, after Sam agreed to give Paul a tab, Norm ordered a beer and put it on Paul's tab.

questions.text: What did John Allen Hill ask Carla?
questions.correct: Clinically speaking are you considered a dwarf or a midget?
options: Frankly speaking are you a cocktail waitress or just a loser?
Technically speaking are you considered ugly or hideous?
Logically speaking are you dumb or stupid?
questions.explanation:
Clinically speaking are you considered a dwarf or a midget?.

	She responded with, "Is that your head or is your neck blowing a bubble?" The two of them were always trading insults.

questions.text: What did Sam say he was out of?
questions.explanation:
Vermouth.

	Vermouth is a type of red or white wine that is used in cocktails. Rebecca was supposed to order more but she didn't.

questions.text: How much cash did Rebecca offer Sam for the bar?
questions.explanation:
$25,000.

	Sam had no intention of selling the bar so he didn't take Rebecca seriously. Rebecca, however, was determined to own the bar.

questions.text: Where would Rebecca get all the money for the bar?
questions.explanation:
dad.

	He agreed to give her the money if she never "came home again and wept so hard she threw up at the kitchen table". Rebecca's father was in the Navy, which we learned in a previous episode a seasons ago.

questions.text: How much did Sam say he'd sell the bar for?
questions.explanation:
$25 million.

	Rebecca was frustrated with Sam. Sam, who still did not take Rebecca seriously, offered to donate a nickle to Rebecca's fundraiser that he started, so she could get the bar back.

questions.text: What did Cliff tell Rebecca and the appraiser about the East Coast?
questions.explanation:
It's smiling.

	The appraiser asked Rebecca if Cliff would be there all the time. When Rebecca said she didn't know, the appraiser said he'd run the figures both ways.

questions.text: Who got reading glasses in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	She said she got reading glasses at a "one hour joint." She also threatened to cut out the tongue of anyone who insulted her. Cliff insulted her and then said, "I don't care, it's worth a tongue."

questions.text: Who came on to Hill in hopes of buying the bathrooms and poolroom?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	She didn't expect him to take her quite so seriously. He, however, was prepared to have sex with Rebecca right then and there.

questions.text: What were the names of the twins Sam introduced to Hill?
questions.explanation:
Hope and Joy.

	Hope was played by Adele Baughn. Joy was played by Anadel Baughn.
